entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student in the class who seems unable to restrain herself from speaking out of turn.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the teacher who is teaching the lesson and is known for his deadly calm voice.

entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: Miss Granger is a title given to Hermione by Snape.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is a teacher who has taught the class about werewolves.

relationships.description: Snape teaches Hermione in the class.
Snape contrasts with Professor Lupin, who has taught the class about werewolves.
